profile.name: Feross Aboukhadijeh
profile.headline: Founder & CEO at Socket | Creator of WebTorrent & Standard | Web Security Lecturer at Stanford
profile.about: I am the Founder and CEO of Socket, dedicated to enhancing software supply chain security. With a deep commitment to open source, I've developed and maintained over 100 npm packages, including widely-adopted projects like WebTorrent and Standard. I also share my expertise by lecturing on Web Security at Stanford University.
